original_text: “Now then, as soon as this letter comes to you, seeing your master's sons are with you, and there are with you chariots and horses, fortified cities also, and weapons,
korean_text: 너희 주의 아들들이 너희와 함께 있고 또 병거와 말과 견고한 성과 무기가 너희에게 있으니 이 편지가 너희에게 이르거든

sentences.original_text: as soon as this letter comes to you,
seeing your master's sons are with you,
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 주인의 아들들이 너희와 함께 있으니,

sentences.original_text: and there are with you chariots and horses,
